paper.title: Risk measurement of China's green financial market based on B-spline quantile regression
paper.abstract: To accurately measure the spillover effect of China's green financial carbon emission market, a new measurement of conditional value at risk (CoVaR) based on the B-spline quantile methods is proposed. Firstly, the variable coefficient CoVaR model is constructed, and the model coefficients are estimated by the B-spline quantile method. Then, the relationship between & UDelta;conditional value at risk (& UDelta;CoVaR) and value at risk (VaR) is considered. In the empirical analysis, we investigate five carbon trading quota risk measurements of the carbon emission projects in China from 2014 to 2022, and verify the B-spline superiority by Monte Carlo simulation. The empirical results show that B-spline method has the highest risk fitting success rate and the smallest error.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是提出了一种基于B样条分位数回归的条件风险价值（CoVaR）测量方法，并应用于中国绿色金融碳交易市场的风险测量。这直接涉及金融风险管理领域，特别是市场风险的量化和管理。
